text: Zmina Svyashchennykh Misyatsiv ye znak nadmirnoho disbelief; tse dodayet使sya zbyvayuche z shlyakhu tsykh khto disbelieved. Vony zastupnyk Svyashchenni Misyatsi ta rehulyarni misyatsi, toy chas, yak zberihayuchy chyslo misyatsiv consecrated BOHOM. Vony takym chynom porushuyut使 yakoho BOHA consecrated. Yikhni z路hubni pratsi prykrashayut使sya u yikhnikh ochakh. BOH ne keruye disbelieving lyudy
